text: yātoru (putiya) attiyāyam iṟakkappaṭṭāl avarkaḷ oruvaraiyoruvar nōkki' "uṅkaḷai yārāvatu pārttu viṭṭārkaḷō?" Eṉṟu kēṭṭuk koṇṭē tirumpi(p pōy) viṭukiṉṟaṉar; allāh avarkaḷuṭaiya neñcaṅkaḷai (oḷiyiṉ pakkattiliruntu) tiruppi viṭṭāṉ - (kāraṇameṉṉaveṉil) avarkaḷ cattiyattai aṟintu koḷḷa muṭiyāta makkaḷāka irukkiṉṟaṉar
